taskDescription:
Set <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">{</mo>
  <mi>h</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>a</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>y</mi>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">}</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A = \{h,a,p,y\}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>B</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">{</mo>
  <mi>s</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>a</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mi>d</mi>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">}</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">B = \{s,a,d\}</annotation></semantics></math>. Find <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A</annotation></semantics></math> intersection <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>B</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">B</annotation></semantics></math>.
detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-OP MJX-fixedlimits">
    <mo>∩<!-- ∩ --></mo>
  </mrow>
  <mo>⁡<!-- ⁡ --></mo>
  <mi>B</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">{</mo>
  <mi>a</mi>
  <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">}</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A\mathop  \cap \nolimits B = \{ a\}</annotation></semantics></math>
